member.name: M:Sandbox.UI.StringExtensions.CollapseWhiteSpaceRegex
member.remarks:
Pattern:
\\s+
Explanation:
Match a whitespace character atomically at least once.

member.name: M:Sandbox.UI.StringExtensions.CollapseWhiteSpace(System.String)
member.summary: Collapse sequences of whitespace into a single whitespace. Used for WhiteSpace.Normal and WhiteSpace.NoWrap.

member.name: M:Sandbox.UI.StringExtensions.CollapseSpacesAndTabsRegex
member.remarks:
Pattern:
[ \\t]+
Explanation:
Match a character in the set [\t ] atomically at least once.

member.name: M:Sandbox.UI.StringExtensions.RemoveSpacesAroundLineBreaksRegex
member.remarks:
Pattern:
(?<=\\n|\\u2029)[ \\t]+|[ \\t]+(?=\\n|\\u2029)
Explanation:
Match with 2 alternative expressions, atomically.
Match a sequence of expressions.
Zero-width positive lookbehind.
Match a character in the set [\n\u2029] right-to-left.
Match a character in the set [\t ] atomically at least once.
Match a sequence of expressions.
Match a character in the set [\t ] atomically at least once.
Zero-width positive lookahead.
Match a character in the set [\n\u2029].

member.name: M:Sandbox.UI.StringExtensions.CollapseSpacesAndPreserveLines(System.String)
member.summary: Collapse sequences of spaces and tabs into a single space, preserving newlines. Used for WhiteSpace.PreLine.

member.param: CSS cursor value (e.g., "pointer", "text", "default")
member.remarks: The following CSS cursor values are intentionally unsupported and will return null: - url(...) - Custom cursor images - alias, cell, copy, help, zoom-in, zoom-out - Less common cursors - context-menu, col-resize, row-resize - Specialized cursors - none, inherit, initial, unset - CSS keywords Any unrecognized value will also return null, defaulting to the system cursor.
